title: Please - Positional Blind Queues
body:
Riot, could we please have positional blind queues? So like draft pick, you enter the queue with a first and second choice for a position. When the queue pops, you are placed in your spot and can pick any champ blind to the other team. No serial picks. No bans.

This would solve 90% of the problems in blind pick that start in the queue chat with "I called top." "No I called top." "No I called top." "No I called top." "No I called top." "No I called top." "No I called top."

Result: Nice quick entry into games without all the grief about who called what position.

It's easy, you already have all of the pieces. Just put them together in the right order.

replies.body: Ayyyyy that's not necessarily a bad idea! It's something we might be able to add at some point down the line, but in the meantime, I'd suggest taking this post over to the [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) board to get more feedback from your fellow players to see what they think as well!
